DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate Magnesium add ropivacaine reduce onset time enhance offset time .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly divide two group : group `` M '' ( Ropivacaina 7,5 mg/ml Mg 4 mg/Kg ) group '' C '' ( without Mg ) . Standard monitoring apply patient perioperative period . An indipendent observer collect data : time perform block , sensitivity onset , motor onset , pain surgery complication . In post-operative period till 24 hour patient evaluate off-set time , pain analgesic consumption .
